text: Kimberley Dawn Locke (born January 3, 1978) is an American singer-songwriter and model. Locke first came to national attention when she was a contestant on American Idol. Locke was born in Hartsville, Tennessee. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American singer- songwriters Category:Models from Tennessee Category:American Idol contestants
title: Kimberley Locke
